WorkItem.Description:
I want to get the source file list of  the visual studio 2010 project (such as visual c++ project) which used at process of compiling. Not all files in the project.
If the source file list include full path will be better.
Using Visual Studio Addins.
WorkItem.Summary: How to get the source file list of Visual Studio project
